structured_data.document_type: ADT-1 Form - Notice of Auditor Appointment

summary_context.purpose: This document notifies the Registrar of Companies about the appointment of an auditor

key_narrative_points: The company ALUPA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED has appointed an auditor
The appointed auditor is MALLYA & MALLYA

summary_template.executive_summary: This ADT-1 form represents the {appointment_nature} of {auditor_firm_name} as auditor for {company_name} (CIN: {company_cin}) for the financial period from {audit_period_start} to {audit_period_end}.
summary_template.timeline: Appointment effective from {appointment_date}, covering {financial_years_count} financial year(s)
summary_template.compliance_status: Form filed on {form_filing_date} with certificate serial {certificate_serial}

llm_prompts.executive_summary_prompt:
Based on the collected data, generate a concise executive summary:

            Company: ALUPA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED (CIN: U74999KA2016PTC095981)
            Auditor: MALLYA & MALLYA (PAN: AABFM8893Q)
            Appointment Type: Casual Vacancy
            Audit Period: 01/04/2022 to 31/03/2027
            Financial Years: 5

            Key Points:
            - The company ALUPA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED has appointed an auditor
- This is a casual vacancy
- The appointed auditor is MALLYA & MALLYA
- Joint auditors have been appointed
- Audit period is from 01/04/2022 to 31/03/2027
- Appointment covers 5 financial year(s)
